name: project-root
description: Tic-Tac-Toe Project with Frontend and Backend

scripts.install:all: npm i && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.start:redis: docker inspect redis-tictactoe > /dev/null 2>&1 || docker run --name redis-tictactoe -p 6379:6379 -d redis && docker start redis-tictactoe
scripts.stop:redis: docker stop redis-tictactoe > /dev/null 2>&1 || true && docker rm redis-tictactoe > /dev/null 2>&1 || true
scripts.dev:socketio: npm run install:all && npm run start:redis && concurrently "npm run start:backend:socketio" "npm run start:frontend:socketio"
scripts.dev:raw: npm run install:all && npm run start:redis && concurrently "npm run start:backend:raw" "npm run start:frontend:raw"
scripts.subscribe:game-moves: docker exec -it redis-tictactoe redis-cli SUBSCRIBE game-moves
